description: The hospital has an entire section within its website devoted to patient stories. The individuals within each story come from different backgrounds, genders, and races.
name: Winson Herry

description: That’s actually where they shine most. Instead of having thousands of the more common and generic two to three sentence reviews,The Cleveland Clinic turned them.
name: Winson Herry

description: If you provide better care at a lower cost, that’s something you need to let prospective clients know while they’re researching where to go for an appointment.
name: Winson Herry
